channel.title: My Dog, Jasper
channel.description:
Today is a sad day for me.
My dog is 11 years old. We got him from my daycare lady, who owned a female Keeshond. We saw him the day after he was born, and bought him right when he was old enough to be away from his mother. I still remember seeing him the day after he was born, when I was less than 5 years old.
He's been acting sick lately, and drinking more water. So today while I was at school, my mom took him to the vet so they could get some urine and blood samples, then brought him back home.
A few hours later now, we receive a call from the vet. It's not good news. He's diabetic now (hence the drinking more water), his kidneys are shutting down, and his liver is in bad shape. They told us we need to take him to intensive care for 24 hours, immediately. So my parents are taking him now. I write this as I wait for news. Hopefully they can do something to make him better.
If you're religious, say a quick prayer. If not, I hope you at least like animals to hope he survives.
He's been a part of my life as long as I can remember.
EDIT - I just got a call from my parents. We need to put him down.
Rest in peace - Jasper
10/1/10

item.title: My Dog, Jasper
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Thanks for all the support guys.

I feel like I should let you know, my parents are going out to get a new Keeshond puppy. I’ll post pics when I can.

Read full topic

item.title: My Dog, Jasper
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

TabbyKiller:

Your story is sadder than the day Beethoven died

if your making a Sick-Minded joke, TRYING to be funny, GTFO

OT:

Sorry man, i know how you feel, my dog, leila, died about 1-2 years ago, she just started puking up blood, and the vet couldn’t find out what was wrong. About a week later she died, it was a long story. She was a German shepherd, i LOVED her to death. We got a new german shepherd about 1 month later, and it helped me get over it, just knowing we’d get another new dog.

May jasper rest in peace.

Read full topic

item.title: My Dog, Jasper
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:38, topic:362490”]I’m sorry dude. But if he had been able to live after days-weeks of intensive care, it wouldn’t have been worth for Jasper or your parents (it costs so much money).

Usually when they need to put a dog/animal down, its for the best.

Rest in peace Jasper.[/quote]Yea, we know. He would have been in constant pain too.

If we do get a new Keeshond tomorrow (read posts above) I’ll post pics.

Read full topic
